original_text:
“If one ventures a word with you, will you be impatient?
    Yet who can keep from speaking?
korean_text: 누가 네게 말하면 네가 싫증을 내겠느냐, 누가 참고 말하지 아니하겠느냐

sentences.original_text: If one ventures a word with you
Yet who can keep from speaking?
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 말하지 않고 있을 누가 있겠습니까?
